chapter.title: Other products
chapter.para: A range of products can be sold through onCourse. You have already seen how you can create classes and open them for enrolment at any price you set. In addition to enrolments in classes you can also sell:
In this chapter we'll focus on the last of these items: product sales.

section.title: Navigating around the Product window
section.para: To open the product window you can either use the splash screen and click on the Voucher type option in the Marketing tab or the onCourse menu Resources â†’ Products

section.title: Adding a new product
section.para:
There are a number of fields in this tab, they are:
Name - allows you to name the product.
Code - allows you to create a code for this product.
Description - this allows you to include a desicription of the product in rich text.
Income account - allows you to select what income account this is connected to.
Status - you can choose whether this product can be either disabled; purchased in the office only; or purchased in the office as well as online.
